unlocks.message:
Fans personalize their Gems through interactions.
Let's see a few examples.
unlocks.heading: LISTENED FOR 1,000 MINUTES
unlocks.title: Streaming PRODUCT unlocks a new element for your Gem.

unlocks.message: Beyond streaming, real-world interactions are also possible, like discovering hidden objects.
unlocks.heading: FOUND A HIDDEN OBJECT
unlocks.title: The secret code on a hidden pool toy at Honest Jon's unlocks a rare element.

unlocks.message: Visiting storied locations with friends can unlock a surprise Gem element for both of you.
unlocks.heading: FOUND A SPECIAL LOCATION
unlocks.title: Walking down Heaven's alley with a friend unlocks a special element.

unlocks.message: Gems slowly reveal the story of an artist and their album in a way that is deeply personal.
unlocks.title: And by unlocking new elements, each Gem becomes progressively more unique to its collector.

unlocks.message:
Gems can take many forms.
Let's see a few more.
